cron job config

(Successful with Red Hat 7.3).

first thing I did was just modify this file directly:/var/spool/cron/lcgerke 


# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE - edit the master and reinstall.
# (cron.txt installed on Thu Aug 22 10:54:19 2002)
# (Cron version -- $Id: cron.htm,v 1.1 2003/01/17 11:38:35 lcgerke Exp $)
0 0 * * * /usr/bin/perl /var/www/html/utilities/dailyDbBackup.pl

Apparently you're not supposed to do that but instead just say crontab -e. It'll bring up an emacs in which you can edit it.:
